content: I think I'll look into NAS devices, specifically the Synology DiskStation. I've heard good things about them and I like the idea of having control over my data. By the way, I've been having some issues with my smart TV's software update, which reminded me of the importance of having a reliable storage system. Speaking of software updates, I had to spend hours troubleshooting the problem with my smart TV's software update last month. It was a real hassle, but at least it's working now.
